params.name: pixel_values
params.type: torch.FloatTensor of shape (batch_size, num_channels, height, width)
params.description: Pixel values. Pixel values can be obtained using AutoImageProcessor. SeeConvNextImageProcessor.call() for details.

params.name: output_hidden_states
params.description: Whether or not to return the hidden states of all layers. See hidden_states under returned tensors formore detail.

params.name: return_dict
params.description: Whether or not to return a ModelOutput instead of a plain tuple.

params.name: labels
params.description: Labels for computing the image classification/regression loss. Indices should be in [0, ..., config.num_labels - 1]. If config.num_labels == 1 a regression loss is computed (Mean-Square loss), Ifconfig.num_labels > 1 a classification loss is computed (Cross-Entropy).
